summary.title: CIS Project I

OR.other: Senior standing in the BS.CSE program
Senior standing in the BS.CIT program

AND.other: Senior standing in the BS.CPE program

summary.description: This course is a largely self-directed senior project in which students demonstrate their mastery of the subjects covered in the BS.CSE, BS.CIT, or BS.CPE program.

course-outcomes.outcome: Develop the requirements for a sizable software or IT project.
Make appropriate use of time management skills and tools.
Design a moderately complex system that integrates existing and newly developed components.
Effectively present information about a project at a range of technical levels.
Document the design and usage of a software system.

course-content.topic: Presenting technical information orally and in writing.

laboratory-studio-outcomes.summary: This course is defined by its lab. See the course outcomes above.

laboratory-studio-content.summary: Self-directed project group work with instructor support.
